edge.coffee

¶ 
module.exports =
¶

Loads and returns an instance of the Edge plugin specified in opts.connect.adaptor

 
    connect: ( context ) -> 

        klass = (require './plugin').load

            type: 'edge'
            name: context.connect.adaptor

        edge = new klass
        
        return edge.connect context
